title: CANT LOGIN
body: Hello ,yesterday i try to login the client  and nothing ....it keep saying to see the server status or follow the steps .i did it all and still cant login ..last week i played normally without an issue please help me .... i play on Europe Nordic and East and i check the region before trying to login ...i even format my pc but still cant play PLEASE HELP ME !!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Same here... 3 days now..
even ran the hextech repair and reinstalled...

This might have just been a weird issue where some of your network settings accidentally reset or possibly just a weird ISP issue. Let's double check your settings first to make sure everything is still looking good there first. Adjust your port forwarding and DNS settings by following our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but make sure you hit the other steps as well.

Same goes for me as well. I've attempted multiple times to login but after authenticating for several minutes it informs me it cannot reach the server. If anyone has insight, it would be most appreciated.
